title: Easy one-banana banana bread
ingredients: ['125g self-raising flour', '100g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '110g butter, melted', '75ml buttermilk', '1 ripe banana, mashed', '1 egg, lightly beaten', 'For the topping', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 tablespoon cold butter', '1 tablespoon soft brown sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt']
